title: mAnavatiyAi
sahitya:
mAnavatiyAi iruppAi parama sukha jnAna patiyai ninaippAi manamE


anupallavi

  mOnattilE varum muttik-kaNavanaiyE mukkaraNangaLuDan pakkuvamAgak-kUDi


caraNam    kAsu paNattinilE Ashai migha vaittE kaN valai vIsiDum kAma valaiyir-sikki mOsam pOghAdE 
anda mOham AghAdE mUla puruSaniDam ati shIlavatiyAi anukUlavatiyAi iru sAlamati iduvE
